SELECT sl.`id`, sl.`agent_account` as agentAccount, sl.`code`, sl.`external_url` as externalUrl, sl.`spread_type` as spreadType, sl.`exclusive_flag` as exclusiveFlag, sl.`user_type` as userType, sl.`user_level` as userLevel, sl.`effective_days` as effectiveDays, sl.`visit_count` as visitCount, sl.`regist_count` as registCount, sl.`rebate`, sl.`discount_amount` as discountAmount, sl.`status`, sl.`is_open_divide_preset` as isOpenDividePreset, sl.`divide_config` as divideConfig, sl.`create_by` as createBy, sl.`create_time` as createTime, sl.`update_by` as updateBy, sl.`update_time` as updateTime, sl.`remark`, m.`super_path` as superPath, m.`agent_level` as agentLevel FROM `spread_link_info` as sl inner join `member` as m on sl.agent_account = m.account
m.parent_name = #{agentAccount}
